whyPlaySection.title: Why Play Spring Meadows
whyPlaySection.description: Spring Meadows Golf Course offers an exceptional playing experience, from pristine fairways to perfectly maintained greens. Our dedicated staff ensures top-tier service, making every round enjoyable. While we can't guarantee your best game, we promise a memorable one. As a family-owned course, we know our patrons and treat them like family. After your round, relax in our Players' Lounge—the ideal 19th hole—where great food, refreshing beverages, and 16 beers on tap await. That's why golfers across Maine and New England choose Spring Meadows. Book your tee time today and experience the difference!

premierCourseSection.title: Maine's Premier Public Golf Course
premierCourseSection.description: An aerial view of a residential area with a tennis court and a golf course.

appPromotionSection.title: New Spring Meadows App
appPromotionSection.description: Download our new mobile app for easy tee time booking and course updates.
